text.section: Beginning July 1, 2012, funds in the Transportation Trust Fund may not be transferred or diverted from that Fund to the General Fund unless legislation is enacted prior to the transfer or diversion that provides for repayment of the funds to the Transportation Trust Fund within 5 years after the transfer or diversion.
This section does not apply to a transfer or diversion of funds under § 8-403 of this article.
